regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Seleciona una Lista ', ['AdryanList', 'AdryanList IZZI', 'ExabyteTV', 'TecnoTV', 'G67', 'Sr.RegioTV', 'PremierTV', 'GSat Latino', 'ChileIPTV']) lists = ['https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adrianhn/adryanlist/master/respaldo/tecno.m3u', 'https://pastebin.com/raw/cyH7vTu8', 'http://exabytetv.info/lista.m3u', 'http://tecnotv.xyz/lista.m3u', 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/G67/G/master/G67C.m3u', 'http://srregio.net/regiotv.m3u', 'http://www.premieriptv.cl/freeiptv.m3u', 'http://www.geantsat.com/freeiptv/s9.m3u', 'http://chileiptv.cl/cl.m3u'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[COLOR deepskyblue][makelist.param3][/COLOR] ahora:[COLOR skyblue][makelist.param4][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 5_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/534.46 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1 Mobile/9B176 Safari/7534.48.3&Referer=http://tvplayerlatino.com/envivo/</link> <info>[makelist.param5]</info> <regex> <name>getUrl</name> <expres>source src="(.*?)"</expres> <page>[makelist.param1]</page> <referer>http://tvplayerlatino.com/envivo/</referer> <agent>Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 5_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/534.46 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1 Mobile/9B176 Safari/7534.48.3</agent> <origin>http://tvplayerlatino.com/envivo/</origin> </regex> <thumbnail>[makelist.param2]</thumbnail> <thumbnail>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adrianhn/adryanlist/master/respaldo/img/tp.jpg</thumbnail> <fanart>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adrianhn/adryanlist/master/respaldo/img/fanart.jpg</fanart>

iem.title: [COLOR lime]• [/COLOR][COLOR skyblue][B]TotalPlay[/B] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray][ Opcion [COLOR lightblue][B]2[/B] [/COLOR] ][/COLOR][COLOR lightslategray][B] [/B] [/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re, requests, HTMLParser def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:50.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/50.0'} sn = 1 data = []
while sn <= 4: site1 = 'http://S1' site2 = 'http://S2blabla' site3 = 'http://Sthree' site4 = 'http://SCUATRO' site= HTMLParser.HTMLParser().site1 + HTMLParser.HTMLParser().site2+ HTMLParser.HTMLParser().site3+ HTMLParser.HTMLParser().site4 source = requests.get(site+ str(sn), headers=headers).text data += re.findall('a href="(http:\/\/.*?.mp4)" title="(.*?)"', source) sn += 1 return data

regex.name: data
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re, requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:50.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/50.0'} sn = 1 data = [] site = 'http://S1', 'http://S2blabla', 'http://Sthree', 'http://SCUATRO' while sn <= 4: source = requests.get(site[sn-1], headers=headers).text data += re.findall('a href="(http:\/\/.*?.mp4)" title="(.*?)"', source) sn += 1 return data

iem.title: [COLOR lime]• [/COLOR][COLOR skyblue][B]TotalPlay[/B] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray][ Opcion 01 [COLOR lightblue][B][/B][/COLOR] ][/COLOR][COLOR lightslategray][B] Con Agenda EPG [test][/B] [/COLOR]

regex.name: test
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,): import time, requests, re, HTMLParser from bisect import bisect_left time = time.strftime("%Y%m%d%H%M%S", time.gmtime()) try: epg = 'http://media.entutele.com/epg/feed.xml' source = requests.get(epg).text # ch = 'TF1' ch = '[makelist.param1]' # ch = 'CANAL\+' # ch = 'France 3 Corse Via Stella' # ch = 'Franceinfo' regex = 'start="(\d+?) .+?channel="' + ch start = re.findall(regex, source) pos = (bisect_left(start, time)) t1 = start[pos] t2 = start[pos + 1] regex = 'start="' + t1 + '.+?channel="' + ch + '">[\\n\\r]*.+?title lang="es">(.+?)<' now = re.findall(regex, source)[0] regex = 'start="' + t2 + '.+?channel="' + ch + '">[\\n\\r]*.+?title lang="es">(.+?)<' next = re.findall(regex, source)[0] except: return ' [COLOR green]No program data[/COLOR]' return ' [COLOR aquamarine][B]Ahora: ' + HTMLParser.HTMLParser().unescape(now) + '\n[/B][/COLOR][COLOR lightslategray] Despues: [/COLOR]' + HTMLParser.HTMLParser().unescape(next)

iem.info: Recuerda hacer tu donacion para seguir mejorando Adryanlist en http://paypal.me/Adryanlist

iem.info: Recuerda hacer tu donacion para seguir mejorando Adryanlist en http://paypal.me/Adryanlist
